## set-webpack-public-path-plugin package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[SetPublicPathCurrentScriptPlugin](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.setpublicpathcurrentscriptplugin.md)


</td><td>

This simple plugin wraps the webpack bundle in an IIFE that sets a the `document.currentScript` value to a variable that is then used to populate the `__webpack_public_path__` variable.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SetPublicPathPlugin](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.setpublicpathplugin.md)


</td><td>

This simple plugin sets the \_\_webpack\_public\_path\_\_ variable to a value specified in the arguments.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
